prompts: Create a zigzag-patterned Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a playful demeanor.
I want a small, fluffy Pokemon with a white underbelly and brown spikes, perfect for urban environments.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a raccoon, with earthy colors and a keen sense for foraging.
Make a playful, quadruped Pokemon with a bushy tail and a knack for hiding in tall grass.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves from a cute, fuzzy creature into something more imposing, with spiky features.
Design a Pokemon that has an affinity for the ground and grass types, showcasing agility and cunning.
Show me a Pokemon with distinctive zigzag patterns across its body, making it stand out in any habitat.
